Don't even get me started on Neji. If you think Neji is a silent calm collected warrior, you're as wrong as seeing your grandparents go at it in your own bed. Don't ask. I already burned the sheets…Back to Neji. He's not as quiet as you think. He's got one hell of a mouth. He has nothing against putting down others harshly. His sarcastic tongue has even made Gai-sensei bow his head in shame. I'll admit it though. I did have a crush on him. Can you blame me? Top of the class, hansom, fiercely strong… In the beginning I went so far as deluding myself saying every harsh word from Neji to Lee was to spur Lee to work harder. I was such a fool. But he's mellowed out some. Ever since his fight with…

Naruto.

Uzumaki Naruto.

I think I first heard of his name nearing the end of my first year of a being a Genin. My team and Gai-sensei just came back from the forest after looking for a pendant some old fool dropped. Took a long, long time. I met him again at the Chunin Exams. I didn't notice him. He did eventually get my attention. When we first walked right into the first exam room, Neji and Lee decided that going deep into the room with other foreign ninjas was a grand idea. He got my attention again during the written test. When I saw a large number of other people about to raise their hand and quit, he yelled again. His little speech gave those little spineless cowards a confidence boost and ended up having that …woman...Complaining about how many students were still left. I remember once believing Sasuke to be cute. In the Forest of Death, that got shot down to hell. Lee, as usual was an idiot and nearly got himself killed fighting those Sound guys. Before Neji had a chance to step in, Sasuke was glowing purple and had black tattoos all over his body. At first, I thought it was kinda fruity, until he went nuts. The way he attacked and disabled that loud mouthed Sound shinobi was horrifying. He even enjoyed it. If there's one thing I hate more, it's anyone enjoying hurting other people. Its one thing to do your job, but you know you're going a bit overboard when you enjoy doing things like that. I then spotted Naruto on the ground unconscious. I had this weird squirmy jerk deep down, but I shook it off and left. When Neji was fighting in the preliminaries...Naruto stood out again defending someone he didn't even know that well. Never remembered anyone, let alone Naruto defend Hinata. I thought it was sweet. Gai-sensei was over there crying muttering something about why couldn't Naruto have been on his team instead of Neji. Men.

Still, I was actually agreeing with him for once. Neji was so cruel in that fight… Poor Hinata.

Then there were the finals. I felt so sorry for him. Someone so spirited to get pitted up against Neji of all people. I felt guilty for helping Neji develop the Kaiten, but since I didn't know Naruto all that well I helped him anyway. Besides, I was still fairly infatuated with Neji at the time. But that gradually disappeared. I didn't even get a thank you for my help.
It was a little hard watching the fight. Naruto couldn't even lay a finger on him. I'm pretty sure everyone gasped when they figured out Naruto's clones weren't normal ones. They were solid. Hell, I was so jealous. That's supposed to be a kinjutsu! How could he have learned it? Anyway, I guessed Neji was getting bored with just pummeling him so he used his blood limit's specialty. After I saw him get into that stance I didn't pay much attention. Just when I thought it was all over..So what I doubted? That wasn't the first time Neji did that. Everyone he did that to, they couldn't even stand, let alone fight. Naruto had done the impossible. He summoned chakra, bizarre chakra at that, even though Neji closed up his Tenkutsu points. I was baffled. I couldn't even ask Gai-sensei, the weird old coot wasn't ever around when I wanted him to be! The shock and frustration was so much, I didn't even realize Naruto managed to heal all of his cuts and bruises. Then he got fast. Real fast. I didn't even see a blur when he moved. I then spotted Naruto rushing Neji head on. I was thinking it was all over, getting knocked with one of his Kaitens that close was a one-hit knockout. After the huge explosion, it looked like Neji won. I couldn't have been more wrong. The ground seemed to just spit up something orange and you could barely make out Naruto knocking Neji in the chin. And won. With one hit! How unbelievable is that! After staring at them with my mouth hanging out for God knows how long, I was expecting Naruto to start rubbing it in. But Naruto didn't gloat. He didn't look at Neji with disgust, or trashed talk him while he was down. He just pranced around like a little kid, like he just got invited to a party or something.

Right there.

I fell for him right there.

I think. Emotions are difficult things to understand.

Maybe it was because of his strength? His dorky personality? He is rather funny. You don't see too many shinobi with a sense of humor now days. They tend to get perverted. Or just plain twisted. Meh. And as time grew on I grew subtly more obsessed with him. Okay maybe not obsessed, but definitely more attracted to the blond. My greatest hero, Tsunade-sama, was brought back to Konoha to become Godaime. Rumor was it that Naruto had been traveling with Tsunade-sama's old teammate Jiraiya just to go look for her. I didn't believe it until I saw Naruto walking with him and Tsunade-sama. She even looked fond of him, it was brief and disappeared as fast as it appeared, but I saw it. All that did was make me yearn for him more. All those "Dead-last" remarks seem so stupid now. Would a "dead-last" looser be traveling around with two sannin? Jiraiya was probably training him too. He was already strong.. Just how strong would he get with Jiraiya training him?

Tenten shut the book and smirked at the dumbfounded shrinkee.

"So the BIG question is...what do I do now that you're mine?" Tenten said.

Wearing his trade mark dopey smile Naruto patted the blone giantess's scalp to grasp her attention. " Hey granny where are we heading? To get help?"

He couldn't see it due to being positioned in the middle of Tsunade's head but her lipstick covered lips formed into a smirk. " First, we're heading for my home. As for helping you...afraid not. You may have forgotten but I was the one who shrunk you in the first place you know."

Tsunade shrugged, careful not to jostle Naruto to an imminent death. " No idea, according to Anko you're quite the foot worshipper. Maybe I'll start you off there and see where it goes."

A young women sat in a chair like throne, the chair itself was rounded on the bottom and seemed to hover over an opening in the stony floor, numerous pipes and wires could be seen coming up from the opening and were attached to the back of the chair as well as a few connecting to its occupants arms and shoulders. The young women occupying the chair had flawless cream colored skin and midnight blue hair combed back into a swan tail cut with two bangs framing her face. The white eyes with a hint of lavender identified her as a Hyuga but, not just any Hyuga but, Hinata Hyuga or in this case a Hinata clone. The clone was about 5ft 3ins, just as the real Hinata was but, unlike the original Hinata this one chose to keep the hair style she had when she was younger. Of all the differences that could be noted however, her hair style was low on the list as there were two very noticeable differences between the original and this one. Number one was how this clone chose to only wear a beautiful night-gown that was a faded, light pink in color, though even that was not much in terms of covering as the night-gown was rather transparent. This was of course not mentioning how it didn’t cover much of her to begin with, which leads us to the second difference that this clone had. She was pregnant, and not just pregnant but, MASSIVLY so. She was so big one might think she had a pair of twelve year olds crammed into this her womb. Yet, even with how inhumanly large she was, her skin showed no signs of blemish or stretch marks, she seemed to simple have a large circular mass of pale creamy skin resting between her legs as she worked.

The clone tilted her head to the side as if confused or listening to something that no one else could hear. When she was done she turned her head and leaned her body to the side so she could look behind her towards the left side. “Master! Master, there is an update from Alpha!” Although her voice was quiet and rather low the acoustics of the cave they were in made it easy for her words to reach her master. Not long after calling a figure silently stepped forward as if he had simply formed from the dark shadows themselves. The figure appeared to be male but, he kept himself covered in a dark blue, nearly black hooded robe with long flowing sleeves. The figure tilted his head towards the Hinata clone and spoke. “Yes my dear Mrs. Lavender? What sort of news does Alpha bring?” the voice had a deep musical quality making it one that people would easily remember. Mrs. Lavender as he called her was his first complete success at his new cloning method and thus he felt she deserved a name to commemorate the occasion. His entire plan hinged on her being able to continue to grow and birth him new Hinata clones.

“Master, Alpha has reported a… partial success in her mission.” Cocking his head to the side in a confused manner the figure made his question known. “Partial success? Her job was to absorb the original and the Nine-tailed container, surly her justu didn’t fail her?” “No Master. Alpha did absorb the original Hinata physically without problem but, her soul and mind interfered with Alpha’s thoughts and forced her to forget about her job to absorb Naruto till it was too late. She is now in the process of entering her mindscape to confront and devour the original’s soul and mind.” The figure simply nodded at this info. Things weren’t going quite as he had planned but, it wasn’t too big a problem to fix, it would just take a little time. “Master…” He turned his gaze back onto the pregnant clone, not that she could see it as his face was completely covered in shadows. Feeling her Masters gaze fall back to her Lavender continued. “Master there were some unexpected side effects to the absorption of the originals body.” She paused for a moment, ready for any possible outburst but, getting none she decided to continue. “Alpha’s physical form has, well grown might be the best way to put it. She now stands at an impressive 6'0 with her body showing noticeable signs of muscle that they originally did not have. Her body also seems to have matured a bit because she looks older then before with her now even curvier body. Her more emphasized curves are mainly her bottom and her breasts. Her bottom has become a bit more rounded and plump but, not so much as to draw to much attention, though her pants aren’t likely to fit anymore. Her breasts however, may cause a problem. They were nearly double D’s before the change and thus still able to be hidden under baggy clothes, now however her bust seems to have grown even larger then even Tsunades. There will be now way for her to hide that and her increase in height.”

The figure of her master simply stood there in the shadows for a few moments before bringing a hand to his shadowed face as if rubbing his chin in thought. “This is quite the serious snag my dear Lavender. Hmm. What is Beta’s status?” Though confused at the sudden change of topic Lavender gave her master the current report. “She is currently awaiting an appropriate time to devour Lady Hokage and assume her place after digestion, though she has stated concern about the apprentice Shizune and the possibility of having to devour her at the same time.” The shadowed figure nodded “Tell Beta that she is authorized to do as she must but, that I’d prefer it if she was to have another of the Hinata clones take Shizune’s place and appearance. While you’re at it, inform the other clones to begin consuming their targets if they get the chance. Konoha must be dealt with before we can concentrate on consuming the other villages and dealing with this Akatsuki and the threat they pose. As for Alpha’s situation, I’d like you to make some changes to one of the clones you’re currently growing.” Lavenders’ eyes drifted to her belly for a moment before shifting back to her master. “Alter her so she can take Alpha’s place and absorb both Alpha and the Nine-tailed container but, make her have her twelve year old appearance as I’m hoping this will offset the physical changes she will likely go thru. In the mean time though, send one of the third tier clones to play the part of Hinata so Alpha is not discovered.” At the affirmative nod he turns to leave but, stops. “By the way Mrs. Lavender, the Naruko clone is nearing completion. So, you will soon have that significant other that you’ve been wanting.” His tone was teasing as he knew just how much the new Naruko clones company and love would mean to Lavender. He chuckled as she thanked him with a dreamy look on her face, obviously already thinking of what she planned to do with her soon to be partner. With that done he takes his leave and melts back into the shadows.

'Must be part of the jutsu,' she thought to herself. Tsunade then, picked up Naruto as gently as she could, and held him in front of her gargantuan face.
"Nice try, you little punk," she mocked. Naruto covered his ears and winced in pain. At her great size, Tsunade's voice was a loud, goddess-like boom, which echoed across the world. Once the echo subsided, Naruto, ignoring the fact that he was on a palm the size of the Land of Fire, shook his fist and screamed at the gargantuan Hokage, telling her that he would never give up, and that he would still beat her and stuff like that.
Tsunade, her hearing, like her vision, upgraded by the jutsu, listened to Naruto rant for a few minutes. To her, his shout was like a tiny squeak, tiny, pathetic. The blonde giantess then let out a giggle, then a cackle, cutting off Naruto's 'speech.'
"What's so funny, Grandma?!" Naruto squeaked in frustration.
"You," Tsunade boomed, "you're a speck, a flea, a germ in the hand of a goddess, and you threaten her? Hahahaha! Pathetic insect. You couldn't even scratch me at this size. Face it: you can't win, little Naruto. Now bow and worship me, your goddess. Hahahaha!
Once his ears had stopped ringing from her booming voice, Naruto looked around for a way to escape or attack the giantess. What he got was a rude awakening: all he could see was Tsunade's palm every way he looked. her flesh rolled on for miles, like a sandless, smooth desert. He finally took in how titanic Tsunade had become, and he realized that he really was speck-sized compared to her. He closed his eyes, and remembered his Ninja Way: "Never give up, and never go back on my word." With that, Naruto clenched his fists and let out a battle cry as he opened his eyes.
"I'll never worship you, Grandma!," he shouted at the looming face of Tsunade overhead, "and I won't give up, no matter what! Believe it!"
'Hmm...seems I underestimated his strength of will,' Tsunade thought to herself, 'well, I'd better break it! I must..."
1441111211.title: Tsunade's Jutsu Overloads...Bigtime

14411112111.content: Will she grow more than one other girl?
14411112111.title: Grow a few other girls. After all, more giantes...

choices: All the kuniochi in the entire world!
Just a few that she knows
144111121111.title: Hell yeah!

choices: Tsunade teaches her students how to be goddesses, using Naruto as her test dummy
It's time to begin their cause! Begin to make the world dominanated by women!
1441111211112.content:
"Hmm. I guess a goddess is nothing without her demigoddesses." Tsunade's voice rumbled, almost thunder-like in strength. She then turned her attention back to Naruto and said, "I'll deal with you later, little ant." Even as Naruto squeaked and shouted in protest, Tsunade's gargantuan fingers came down and gently picked him up between them. She then put Naruto onto her massive shoulder, and began to walk back towards the Leaf Village. Thanks to her million-foot stature, the trip only took a few steps.
As Tsunade gazed down upon the village, she couldn't help but giggle and smirk; the village was absolutely pathetic by comparison. Her foot alone was easily large enough to flatten several blocks at once and still have room to spare. And then she remembered how small Naruto was at his 1 centimeter stature, and she laughed out loud at the thought that even the villagers gathering at her feet were giants compared to him.
"Citizens of the Leaf," she boomed, her head held high and her chin up to show her superiority, "I don't have time to waste on such petty mortal insects, so I'll just cut to the chase: I am your goddess now!"
Once their ears stopped ringing from the busty Hokage's godlike voice, the large crowd of villagers and ninja alike began to murmur and whisper amongst themselves, totally unaware that Tsunade could hear their every word. "So, it seems that some of you have doubts about my powers!" Tsunade exclaimed, "Well how about now!?"
She then lifted her mighty right foot over the village and stomped down on it, annihilating a large portion of it and killing many civilians. That was enough to break the wills of most of the surviving people, who fell to their knees in submission and sobbed uncontrollably.
"Now!" Tsunade continued, lifting her foot out of the massive footprint she had left in the center of the village, "I will choose my demigoddesses, the ones who will be by my side as I change this world into what it is meant to be: a woman's world!"
With that, half the women in the village smiled and raised their hands eagerly, ready to step into the shoes of a goddess.
"First, Shizune! Come forward!" Tsunade ordered, "And leave that pig of yours behind!" Inside the crowd, Shizune reluctantly placed Tonton gently on the ground, and stepped forward towards her former Kage, stopping before her massive feet.
"Now! Feel true power! Feel the might of a goddess!" Tsunade proclaimed as she formed the hand signs for her special jutsu. Suddenly, Shizune began to grow rapidly, shooting upwards like a growing tree. Her clothes couldn't take the strain and were torn apart almost immediately. The villagers watched in horror and excitement as Shizune continued to expand until she was roughly Tsunade's colossal height. The first thing Shizune did was squeal and try to cover her exposed body with her hands. "Relax, Shizune," Tsunade said, "I'll teach you how to make a bra and panties later. Now, come forth Sakura!"
Sakura gasped in surprise and quickly ran forward at her sensei's call. She stopped before the goliath blonde, who formed the hand signs and grew her as well. Sakura gazed down at the world as it shrank and shrank and shrank around her, getting smaller and smaller by the second. She LOVED the feeling of being a giantess, and the feeling of power that coursed through her.
Once Sakura finished her growth, Tsunade called for Ino to step forward. The blonde chunin squealed happily and leapt forward, and just like her rival, began her great ascension as a goddess. And she enjoyed every second of it.
"Now, Tenten, step forward," Tsunade proclaimed. Tenten was shocked, "Me? Really?! Wow!" she cheered as she ran out to receive her wondrous gift. As she grew, the weapon mistress scanned the crowd for her teammates, and soon found them next to Kakashi and the other teams. As soon as her growth came to a halt, Tenten turned to them, stomped her foot down hard and nearly popped everyone's tiny eardrums by shouting, "Yes!!! Who's the strongest now, Lee? Neji? Guy-Sensei? Who's the mightiest of us now???"
Tsunade chuckled in amusement and satisfaction at her new apprentice's actions and at the reactions they generated from the crowd. It was just what she had hoped.
"Now, only two places remain in my kin of goddesses!" Tsunade boomed, "One is of the Hidden Sand Village. Shizune! Go bring her here. You know who I mean."
"Y-yes m'lady." Shizune replied, as she began the extremely short journey to the Hidden Sand Village.
"One more remains here. Anko! Come forth!" Tsunade proclaimed.
"YES! That bug Orouchimaru won't stand a chance against me soon!!!" Anko exclaimed as she rushed forward and began her growth. As soon as that finished, Shizune returned, Temari held loosely in her fist. The kunoichi of the Hidden Sand gazed enviously up at the giantesses, longing with every bit of her heart to become so powerful.
As Shizune placed her gently on the ground, she approached the titanic Tsunade, who said, "Temari of the Sand, you have been chosen for a greater purpose than you can possibly imagine: to be a goddess under my wing to help make this world into a woman's world! Now, feel your inner goddess awake!"
Just like with all the other girls, Temari's growth came rapidly and strong, taking a matter of seconds to reach its end. Finally assembled, the six nude demigoddesses gathered behind their leader, proud of their height and power, and ready to become mistresses of the world. From atop Tsunade's shoulder, the tiny Naruto gawked in shock and slight arousal as the giantesses each locked their enhanced vision on him...and smiled.
1441111211112.title: Just a few that she knows

choices: Sakura and Anko: Stomping Out Orouchimaru
14411112111122.content:
"It's time to begin our cause. But first, let's get you all clothed," Tsunade proclaimed, "Let's go."
"Yeah...this is still awkward..." Shizune, still trying to cover herself with her hands.
With that, the goddesses headed into the forest to create their leaf undergarments. During the process, Tsunade stood proudly, occasionally poking at and teasing the tiny Naruto, who was still perched on her shoulder. The shrunken Jinchuriki was at a loss for words, so he watched for an opening to escape. He looked down off the edge of Tsunade's mighty shoulder and saw the EXTREME drop that would await him if he tried to jump off. And there was no way he could climb down fast enough to avoid being detected by the greatly-enhanced senses of the blonde titaness, even if he used chakra to help. All he could do was watch and wait as each of the demi-goddesses clothed and stood before their leader.
"Alright," Tsunade said once all her followers gathered, "It's time for us to form our plan. I am open to suggestions from all of you."
"Uh, let Naruto go maybe?" Naruto meekly.
"Pfft. Idiot," Ino giggled.
"We're FAR from done with you, little man," Sakura added, winking at the tiny shinobi.
"Alright, back on topic, we could increase our numbers a little more," Anko interjected.
"And maybe crush any lingering threats to our power," Tenten sneered, still on a power-trip from showing her former teammates her might.
"Excellent ideas. We'd best spread out and do both then," Tsunade said, her mouth twisting into a smirk.
"Y-you can't do th-" Naruto cried.
"Alright," Tsunade continued, ignoring her pet, "We'll split up: Sakura and Anko, head to each or Orouchimaru's hideouts and do what must be done."
"Yes!" Anko exclaimed at her chance to get back at Orouchimaru.
"Hmm...Sasuke...." Sakura mumbled, her smile widening.
"Next: Temari, I need you to head to the Land of Stone and recruit the granddaughter of the Tsuchikage, Kurotsuchi. She's PERFECT for our cause," Tsunade continued.
"Heh. Ok," Temari replied coldly.
"Tenten, you head to the Hidden Cloud Village and search for more recruits. Also, make sure to teach that mouthy Raikage a lesson for me," Tsunade continued.
"With pleasure," Tenten replied happily as she cracked her knuckles.
Tsunade smiled in delight and continued, "Ino, head to the Hidden Mist Village and see to recruiting Mei Terumi, the Fifth Mizukage. She would make a prime ally in our goddesshood."
"Oh wow! I've heard so much about her," Ino said.
"And Shizune, I need you to watch over the village for me. Find some new recruits if you can," Tsunade finished.
"Yes, m'lady. Where will you be?" Shizune asked her master.
"Oh, I'll be dealing with the Akatsuki. Word has it that there is a female member among them who is very strong." Tsunade answered, winking.
Naruto shivered; he could tell from her voice that Tsunade was completely serious about conquering the world. But he would have never imagined she would have even the confidence to take on Orouchimaru and even the Akatsuki to do it.
"Alright, let's go and make this world ours!" Tsunade boomed, and the goddesses went their separate ways.

Who will the story follow first?
14411112111122.title: It's time to begin their cause! Begin to ma...

choices: Sakura and Anko: Stomping out Orouchimaru
144111121111221.content:
As Tsunade's footsteps thundered throughout the land, Naruto, nervous at approaching the Akatsuki, finally spoke up:
"Hey Grandma, how can you hope to beat the Akatsuki, even at this size? Their power is INSANE!"
"Sigh, first of all, if you call me "grandma" again, I'll shrink you even more. And second of all, I'll have help," Tsunade replied, her extreme height allowing her to cover the distance to the Hidden Rain Village quickly.
"Help?" Naruto questioned, staring up in wonder at the looming face of his mistress.
"Yes. Just shut up and watch. You'll see," Tsunade said.
Within a few minutes, they reached the Hidden Rain Village.
With that, Tsunade made her casual advance through the twisted buildings and streets as the rain poured down. No matter how many paper bombs, fireballs, kunai and other jutsu pelted her towering body, nothing could even scratch her skin, as if it were made of tempered steel.
Within several minutes of casually knocking over buildings, swatting away justu as if they were flies and stepping on any fighting Rain Ninja, the air began to fill with little pieces of paper.
"Here she comes," Tsunade boomed to the minuscule Naruto.
Within seconds, the paper came together and formed Konan, the paper angel of the Akatsuki.
"Stop right there, giant. What is it you want?" Konan demanded, flying with her angelic paper wings before the mighty Tsunade's face.
"Have you ever wondered why this world is in constant dismay and conflict?" Tsunade thundered.
"...often...why?" Konan asked, her expression softening.
"Because there are no goddesses to keep it under their feet, to keep it from tearing itself apart. I am such a goddess. And I'm offering you a chance to become one as well," Tsunade continued.
"...I'm listening..." Konan replied.
"You see, I have begun a coalition of goddesses, intent on making this world into a woman's world," Tsunade went on, happy her persuasion was going as planned, "And your leader requires you to collect the Tailed Beasts. Trust me, when I'm through with my ascension, not even the Ten-Tails could defeat me. And you could be by my side. What do you say?"
Naruto turned his eyes back towards the paper angel, who closed her eyes, deep in thought. After a minute or two, Konan looked back to the former Hokage and gave her answer, a smile spreading across her face: "Very well. Make me a goddess too, Lady Tsunade."
"Excellent! Let us begin!" Tsunade exclaimed, stepping back from Konan to give her space to grow, "now, feel your true power awaken!"
With that, Tsuande formed the hand signs and Konan began to grow. As she began, she floated to the ground, intent on enjoying the feeling.
"L-lady angel?" a Rain ninja asked as he ran up to the female member of the Akatsuki, "w-what do we do?"
To his shock, that's when Konan's initial spurt occurred; In the blink of an eye, he went from eye-level to knee-level with her as her cloak began to rip apart.
"Bow!" Konan replied, placing her foot on the head of the ninja and forcing him to the ground in a bowing position before her.
"THAT'S it," Tsunade exclaimed.
"Not another one!!!" Naruto cried out in terror.
Within a few more seconds, Konan was naked and eye-level with the top of Pain's tower. The leader of the Akatsuki emerged from his tower to face his loyal partner.
"What is the meaning of this?!" Pain shouted angrily.
"This has gone on far enough," Konan replied as her head grew taller than the tower, "you think you're a god? Take a good look at me, little man!" With that, Konan's spurt went into full-swing, her expanding frame knocking over the tower. Within another minute, she was a proud million feet in height, the same as Tsunade and the others.
"Wow...this feels AMAZING!" Konan exclaimed, spreading her arms and looking up to the sky.
"Heh yes it does. Now, let's go back to the Leaf Village. Don't worry: you'll get your chance to deal with your teammates later," Tsunade replied. With that, the two titans thundered out of the village and back towards the Land of Fire.
Her vision now enhance, Konan noticed the puny Naruto for the first time: "Hello, little one. What's your name?" she asked him in a now godlike, booming voice.
"Naruto Uzumaki! And I'm the one who's gonna stop all of you!!!" Naruto cried out.
"Ah ah ah, you don't use that kind of language with goddesses, little one," Tsunade said, forming a hand sign to shrink him a tiny bit more as punishment.

Who will we cut to next?
144111121111221.title: Tsunade (with Naruto): Conquering the Akatsuki

1441111211112211.content:
As Sakura and Anko stomped through the land, people gawked in terror, arousal or both at the mighty titanesses. However, the kunoichis didn't seem to care, as they casually crushed towns along the way.
"So, are we sure this is the way to Orouchimaru's North Hideout?" Sakura asked the Jonin.
"Yeah. The intel unit sent word a few weeks ago. This is his primary base of operations," Anko replied. She then clenched her fists and gritted her teeth, "Just promise me one thing, Sakura."
"What?" Sakura replied, confused at her fellow goddess's sudden show of emotion.
"The worm is mine. I plan to make him suffer for a LONG time..." Anko replied, a slight smirk creeping onto her face.
"Hehe. Ok. I didn't really care about him anyways..." Sakura answered, her eyes turning serious, "Sasuke...I'm coming for you..."
After about a half hour of searching, the goddesses caught sight of a familiar face heading towards the mountains north of the Hidden Grass Village: Kabuto Yakushi.
"Ugh that traitorous little cockroach..." Anko muttered.
"He must be heading for Orouchimaru's hideout. We should follow him there," Sakura suggested.
"Sigh, we're too strong and powerful to just sneak after him. Just follow my lead." With that, Anko led Sakura into the mountains. Kabuto felt the tremors long before he saw the goliath women step over the peaks and stand on either side of him.
"Oh my god..." Kabuto whimpered as Anko lifted her gigantic foot over him and glared down at him.
"That's it, insect! Smell it!" Anko thundered as she slowly lowered her sole down upon him. The scent alone overwhelmed Kabuto, and Sakura giggled at his weakness.
"Now, tell me or be crushed: where is the hideout?" Anko interrogated, wiggling her massive toes far over Kabuto's head.
"T-that way! Not far!" Kabuto squeaked, pointing to the north.
"Good boy," Anko cooed, placing her foot back with her other one and allowing Kabuto to breathe once more.
"Allow me." Sakura chimed in, exhaling heavily and blowing Kabuto over the nearest mountain.
"Heh. Not bad," Anko chuckled, and they continued on their way.
After another five minutes, they saw the doorway into the mountain, no doubt where Orouchimaru built his hideout.
"Grr! How do we get at him? We can't fit inside!" Anko shouted angrily.
"Hehe we don't go in..." Sakura smirked and walked up to the mountain, "Cha!" With that, Sakura back-handed the side of the mountain, taking the top half of it clean off.
The Sound Ninja inside immediately began to panic, rushing away from the twin titans.
"Where is the worm?!" Anko roared, stomping a foot down on the base, crushing a good portion of it. Hearing his name, the snake master walked out to face his former pupil.
"Anko...you've certainly changed..." Orouchimaru said, visibly intimidated by her frame.
"...It's time for your goddess to punish you...for what you did to her!" Immediately, Anko grabbed him and began to walk away with him.
"I'll be back in a minute. Have fun, Sakura," Anko said to her fellow goddess as she walked off to have her "alone time" with her former master.
Sakura then turned her attention back to the chaotic base. "Sasuke, where are you?" she taunted, stomping Sound Ninja that tried to attack her, "Come out come out wherever you are, little man!"
As if on cue, she felt something tickling her leg. She looked down and saw Sasuke rapidly climbing her using chakra, sword drawn, Sharingan active and Chidori roaring to life in his hand. In a few seconds, the young Uchiha reached her neck.
"Idiot..." Sasuke muttered as he rammed the Chidori right into Sakura's chin. To his utter shock, Sakura giggled, as the puny Chidori was only enough to tickle her skin. Before he could flee, Sasuke found himself in her powerful, iron vice-like grip.
"No, no, no. You don't treat a lady like that. Especially one as important as me." With that, Sakura began to tighter her grip on his little body. Sasuke gasped for air and soon passed out from the lack of oxygen. Her prize secured, Sakura placed Sasuke between her boobs where she could keep track of him.
"Sleep, little Sasuke," Sakura cooed gently, "When you wake up, we can play."
After waiting for a few minutes, Anko returned.
"How did it go?" Sakura asked.
"Well, used up all his chakra. Now he's doomed," Anko answered.
"Anko! I'm sorry! Please don't kill me!" Orouchimaru pleaded as he was placed on the ground, barely able to stand from his lack of chakra reserves.
"Shut up, insect! And look up at me!" Anko rumbled, raising her foot and quickly stomping down on him several times until he was completely gone.
"Sigh. and that's a weight lifted off my chest," Anko declared.
"We'd better head back. Lady Tsunade will want to meet back up with us," Sakura said, adjusting her boobs around the minuscule Sasuke. They then began the journey back to the Leaf Village

Who will we follow next?
1441111211112211.title: Sakura and Anko: Stomping out Orouchimaru

14411112111122111.content:
Across the land, the titanic Tenten strolled through the miniaturized Land of Lightning. As she walked, she marveled at the raw power she now wielded, and that her toes alone were each the size of a small town EACH. She cackled, the jutsu finally allowing her to release her inner ambition, and she made sure to leave plenty of miles-long footprints behind to leave her mark.
Within about twenty minutes, she reached the Thundercloud Ravine, the favorite training spot of the Eight-Tailed Jinchuriki Killer Bee. And that's just where he was when he saw the colossal kunoichi literally shove and part the mountains out of her way with ease and being walking through the ravine, a devilish grin on her face.
Upon seeing her, Bee took out his notebook and began writing down new rhymes:
"That giant really likes to walk, but I'm not near any beanstalk," Bee, testing his rap under his breath. His thoughts were interrupted by a massive foot, flattening the entire ravine and almost him in the process. All the goliath girl did was shrug before she moved on towards the Cloud Village.
Having barely survived the insane impact on the area, Bee, catching his breath from sprinting, opened his notebook again: "Man that woman is a power-packed force. But not as strong as my brother or me of course."
After less than six more strides, Tenten reached the Hidden Cloud Village. Almost immediately, she burst out laughing: the tallest peaks there came up to just under her knees, and she knelt down next to the puny village to compensate. Even then, her towering form loomed over the village, her head alone blotting out the sun itself.
'Hmm, how to get his attention...' Tenten pondered as the villagers panicked before her. It only took a few seconds for a devious idea to form in her mind.
"Listen up tinies!" she boomed to the fleeing villagers, "If you want to live, listen closely! It was a long walk here and my feet are tired and sweaty," she paused as she shifted her pose and propped her humongous feet in the village center, "Rub! Rub your god's feet! Right now!"
To add to her intimidation tactic, with a mere swing of her hand, she broke the bridge leading out of the village, allowing no escape for its occupants. With nowhere to run, the villagers and ninja alike had no choice but to approach the mighty pair of feet in their village square, which stretched FAR higher than even the Raikage's building. They immediately hesitated as the powerful smell hit them, which had quickly spread through the entire village.
"That's it, bugs! Smell! Get used to it!" Tenten ordered, giggling as she did. The villagers, dying a little inside, complied, allowing the smell to fill their lungs. They then grouped up as best they can and got to work massaging Tenten's soles.
"Ahh...not bad, runts," Tenten moaned, "make sure you send someone up to reach my toes. They could use a good licking."
"Enough!" a voice shouted from atop the Raikage building. Naturally, it was Ay, the Raikage, along with his assistant Mabui.
"Oh god! She's enormous!" Mabui shrieked at the sight of the titanic Tenten.
"Giant! Leave my village or be destroyed!: Ay roared loudly.
"Sigh, excuse me: I'm enjoying a foot rub. Come back later," Tenten said dismissively with a wave of her hand.
"Grrr! You dare ignore me!" Ay exploded, activating his Lightning Armor.
"M'lord, we'd best not antagonize her," Mabui advised.
"Hmm...you'd better listen to her, little guy. Cuz you might be bowing at her feet one day," Tenten mocked, not even turning her attention to the Raikage.
"Huh?" Mabui exclaimed in surprise.
"Enough!!! Get out of my village or else, little girl!!!" Ay commanded.
"Bowing at MY feet?" Mabui asked the mighty giantess.
"Yeah. He's a bossy prick isn't he? Well, I can make sure he can't boss you around any more," Tenten assured, completely ignoring Ay.
"....how?" Mabui replied.
"Like this," Tenten chuckled, forming hand signs.
"Grr! Stop ignoring me!!!" Ay shouted, charging up for an attack. However, before he could move, a strong, tanned arm grabbed him around the waist.
"It feels so good!" Mabui exclaimed, her growth having already reached its first stages.
"Mabui??? What has she done to you?!" Ay roared in anger, as his assistant's ankles became higher up than his head.
"Shut up, slave!!!" Mabui commanded, throwing Ay HARD onto the roof of the Raikage building. Before he could react, the Raikage found a giant, growing foot placed on his chest, growing stronger and more difficult to keep at bay by the second.
"Hmmm thank you, giantess," Mabui said, thanking the still relaxing Tenten.
"Heh. No problem. But Lady Tsunade wants to see your former boss. Mind taking him with us to meet her?" Tenten asked, withdrawing her feet from the village and finally allowing them some fresh air.
"Sure!" Mabui replied, smiling happily as she continued to grow. She then picked up the Raikage and held him firmly in her fist as she finished growing to Tenten's height.
"I'll explain what's going on along the way," Tenten said as she and Mabui exited the village, headed back to the Land of Fire.

Who will we follow next?
14411112111122111.title: Tenten: Bullying the Raikage

144111121111221111.content:
While watching over the tiny Leaf Village, Shizune had decided to get the villagers to work creating a special gift for Tsunade, which she would give to her upon her return. Although they at first persisted, a raised foot over half the village was enough to convince the puny villagers to get to work. While they worked, the goddess took several kunoichi aside to see who would be worthy of being new demi-goddesses under Tsunade's wing.
To start, Shizune asked each of them questions, such as: "what would you do with infinite power?" or "what do you do to a bug when u see it on the floor?" and their answers allowed her to discern who was worthy. Then it was on to the second test.
"Alright, Hinata: what do you do?" the reclining Shizune boomed overhead at the goddess-in-training. Before her in the clearing was Hinata, standing over a shrunken Kotetsu, who was begging her for mercy.
"I...I think I'm supposed to step on him but..." Hinata stammered, her foot tapping on the ground.
"Sigh. Come on, Hinata. There's an insect in your way; what do you do?" Shizune asked again.
When Hinata hesitated again, Kurenai stepped forward impatiently. "Hinata, it's easy. Watch." With that, her sensei raised her sandal over the tiny Kotetsu and stomped down hard. Thankfully, Kotetsu was alive, having turned to fit into Kurenai's tread-print to avoid being squashed.
"Very good, Kurenai," Shizune complimented, forming a hand sign. Suddenly, Kurenai's height was boosted to about 10 ft.
"Wow! It feels incredible!" Kurenai exclaimed.
"You pass, Kurenai. We'll finish your growth later," Shizune declared.
"Excellent," Kurenai proudly replied. She then patted Hinata's head, "alright, Hinata; your turn."
Hinata swallowed and raised her foot over Kotetsu, who was still begging her for life. After another brief pause, Hinata finally let go and slammed her foot down on the puny Leaf Chunin, pulverizing him.
"Very good, Hinata! You pass!" Shizune thundered, clapping her hands happily. She then formed a hand sign and boosted Hinata's height as well. Hinata moaned as the feeling of raw power surged through her body.
"Alright, who's next?" Shizune asked, shifting her reclined position and causing a mini earthquake.
"Me! Me! Me!" Hanabi Hyuga yelled, rushing forward to stand beside her sister.
"Sigh, Hanabi what are you doing here?" Hinata asked, feeling embarrassed.
"Why else? To ascend! And be like Lady Tsunade!" Hanabi replied cheerfully.
Overhead, Shizune chuckled and formed a different hand sign. In a small poof of smoke, a shrunken Izumo, just as tiny as Kotetsu was, appeared before Hanabi.
"It's good to see such ambitious young blood. Alright, show me what you can do," Shizune said.
"Yes!" Hanabi squealed, stomping towards the shrunken chunin. Izumo, terrified at the massive sandals trying to stomp him, tried to run to no avail. He was quickly caught not by Hanabi's shoe but by her fingers, which pinched him and carried him up to her face.
"You ready tiny?" Hanabi mocked as she removed her sandal and placed Izumo directly in the center of it. Before he could run, she then slid her foot into the sandal, pinning him beneath it.
"Teehee. He tickles," Hanabi giggled, wiggling her toes in glee.
"Outstanding! You pass, my dear!" Shizune, forming the hand sign again and boosting Hanabi's height to that of Kurenai and Hinata.
"Yes!" Hanabi cheered, twirling in happiness and causing Hinata to facepalm and sigh.
"Alright, your ascension will occur on Lady Tsunade's return,"Shizune declared, "Until then, I need you three to work on keeping the villagers in line and on track with making Tsunade's gift."
"Yes ma'am," the three amazons acknowledged, rushing back towards the village, leaving Shizune to relax.

Who will we follow next?
144111121111221111.title: Shizune: Chosing More Followers

1441111211112211111.content:
Meanwhile, in the Land of Earth, a certain Stone kunoichi was relaxing atop the roof of the Kazekage building. It was Kurotsuchi, the granddaughter of Ohnoki, the 3rd Tsuchikage, dreaming of a day where she could become the Tsuchikage herself and boss the villagers around. As she stretched out on the roof looking up at the sky, she imagined wearing a crown and bossing around her former superiors, including her father Kitsuchi, and making them do whatever she wanted. It was this mentality that prompted Ohnoki to put off training her to be a Kage, as he feared what she would do with that kind of power. When that thought crossed her mind, she clenched her fists in frustration.
Suddenly, the ground began to shake gently beneath the building's foundation. "Must be the old man training again," Kurotsuchi grumbled, trying to go back to her daydreaming. However, the tremors only grew stronger, prompting her to climb to her feet to investigate. And that's when she saw Temari, approaching the village in the distance.
The first thing that the Stone Village girl thought came right out of her mouth: "Wow!" She marveled at the sheer size of Temari and the extreme distances she was covering in such a casual pace. However, her admiration was quickly replaced by raw jealousy, and a desire to be so powerful.
By then, Ohnoki was already gathering up ninja to help him defend his village, and they were forming whatever defenses they could with Earth-Style jutsu.
"Sigh maybe I should help," Kurotsuchi thought. However, she quickly changed her mind, as she wanted to see how the villagers would fare against such an opponent.
Naturally, the battle did not last very long. In a single stomp, Temari demolished most of the defenses around the village and broke their ranks. From there, the Sand Kunoichi simply toyed with them, raising her feet over the village as an intimidation tactic.
"Where is the Stone Kunoichi known as "Kurotsuchi?" Temari boomed overhead, sending vibrations throughout the bodies of everyone in the broken village. Upon hearing her name, Kurotsuchi gasped and raised her arms, drawing Temari's attention. The giantess then knelt down and went down on her hands and knees to speak closer on Kurotsuchi's level.
"Do not be afraid, my sister," Temari said gently, as to not send the stone ninja flying off the roof.
"I'm not. But I will admit one thing: I'm really jealous of you," Kurotsuchi replied to the looming face before her, "If I may ask: how did this happen to you?"
"Lady Tsunade has decided to "tip the scale" of this world and has made a coalition of goddesses to set it straight," Temari replied, "In fact, thats why I'm here; Tsunade herself asked me to come and ask you to join us."
"R-really?" Kurotsuchi blurted in disbelief.
"Yes. Think: you would be unstoppable. You-"
"Yes!!!" Kurotsuchi cried in sheer joy, as her fantasies were finally coming to life.
Temari chuckled at her enthusiasm, sat up and formed several hand signs. Immediately, Kurotsuchi exploded in size, her clothing being torn to shreds in an instant. "Wow! T-this feels...AMAZING!" she exclaimed, as the feeling of raw power within her continued to increase exponentially. Within minutes, she stood a million feet tall, just like the others, and took her first look down at a forever-changed world.
She immediately burst out laughing, popping the eardrums of many of the citizens below. Her feet had engulfed far more than just the flattened Tsuchikage building, but most of the village in general. She could feel the Stone ninja launching an assault on her toes, which registered as a very faint tickle. But with a simple wiggle of her toes, the ninja were overpowered and defeated.
"Oh my God! I'm HUGE!" she exclaimed as she watched the villagers flee from her might.
"Yeah. But now, we've got to go back to the Leaf Village and introduce you to Lady Tsunade. Don't worry; you can have your playtime here afterwards," Temari said with a wink. Kurotsuchi nodded and followed her from the village. A few seconds later, Kurotsuchi felt a small itch on her right shoulder. She turned and, with her enhanced vision, saw Ohnoki, his Stone Golem jutsu pounding away inneffectively at her skin. Kurotsuchi smirked and exclaimed: "ew, a flea," before flicking the teeny tiny Tsuchikage off her shoulder and continuing on behind Temari
1441111211112211111.title: Temari: Recruiting Kurotsuchi

choices: The Goddesses Meet Back in the Land of Fire
14411112111122111111.content:
Meanwhile, in the Land of Waves, the massive Ino was soaking her feet in the ocean before the Mist Village while the mist ninja far below attacked her however they could. The goliath girl giggled as the tiny Water Dragon and Water Wall jutsu splashed pathetically against her legs. However, after a few minutes, she grew bored and decided to speed up the process of getting the Mizukage, Mei Terumi to come out and talk with her.
"Sigh, are you guys not done yet? Face it: you can't even scratch me, let alone defeat me," she mocked at the army of specks attacking her, "But either way, I can't waste any more time on you mortals." With that, Ino raised her foot over the water and stomped down hard, creating a massive splash accompanied by a massive tidal wave, which washed the tiny ninja away and crashed down into the village.
Naturally, as her village was flooded around her, Mei Terumi decided to step out to face the enormous blond kunoichi. She stood atop the remains of the highest tower in the village and called out the giantess, who knelt down before her to speak with her correctly.
"What is it you want, girl??" Mei demanded angrily, her orange hair still damp from the tsunami's impact.
"I'm sorry about your village, Mizukage, but I needed to stop your ninja from attacking me," Ino's mighty voice boomed back, "and I kinda got carried away."
"Sigh, we are clearly at your mercy, giant. What do you plan to do?" the Mizukage said, twisting some of the water from her damp hair.
"I came to invite you to join me at...this level," Ino said, sitting down and crossing her legs, "You see, Lady Tsunade has ascended to goddesshood and has a plan to make girls more powerful. However, she requested we recruit a team of demigoddesses to assist her. She sent me to ask you to join us in our cause and become one of us."
"Well, i will admit...being the Mizukage can be kinda boring..." Mei replied, pacing back and forth, "it makes it difficult to find a suitable man for me..."
"Well, when you're this big and powerful," Ino said, motioning to herself, "who can ignore you? Teehee"
"Heh you're right...very well..." Mei answered, putting her hands on her hips and smiling.
"Yes! Alright, get ready," Ino exclaimed, standing back up and stepping back to give the Mizukage room. She then formed the hand signs for Tsunade's powerful jutsu and Mei began to grow rapidly, her clothes becoming rags almost instantly. She moaned in delight as she leaped off the tower before it would collapse under her increasing weight. Her villagers gasped and gawked at her expanding form, some because she was giant and others because she was naked.
Within a few minutes, Mei's growth was complete. "Oh my...I feel...so powerful..." she exclaimed, flexing her arms and legs.
"Hehe yeah. Now, it's time to go see Lady Tsunade. the other girls must be arriving soon as well." Ino said, motioning for Mei to follow her. Obsessed with her own power, Mei completely forgot about her waterlogged village and followed Ino back out of the Land of Waves.
14411112111122111111.title: Ino: Recruiting the Mizukage

144111121111221111111.content:
Within another hour, the goddesses would rendezvous back in the Leaf Forest for their meeting. To avoid being eavesdropped by the tiny residents of the Village, Shizune had stomped out a massive clearing several miles from it to create a suitable meeting spot. On top of that, she had forced the villagers to gather leaves and such to form small "pillows" for the goddesses to sit on wile they talked. To top it all off, with the help of Kurenai, Hinata and Hanabi, erected a barrier around the sight, which would block any sound generated by their booming voices from the outside world. Proud of her work, Shizune pushed the villagers harder in creating her "gift" for Tsunade so it would be finished before she arrived.
Soon, Ino and Mei were the first to arrive.
"Well, I see the mission was a success," Shizune commended.
"Yup," Ino exclaimed proudly, "Lady Shizune; meet Mei Terumi, the 5th Mizukage."
"Nice to meet you," Mei chimed in with a smile.
"Likewise," Shizune replied.
After a few more minutes, Anko and Sakura arrived, the tiny Sasuke still held firmly between Sakura's boobs. After greetings were exchanged, Sakura saw the three amazons waiting by the barrier.
"Wow. Kurenai Sensei and Hinata! You were chosen to join us?" she exclaimed, sitting down before them.
"Me too!" Hanabi shouted, waving her arms.
"Shizune said we would be grown when Tsunade returned," Kurenai added.
"Hmm good. I'll let you know in advance: it feels AMAZING," Sakura replied, winking at them. Hinata only grinned in response.
Moments later, the booming footsteps of Tenten and Mabui approached, followed by those of Kurotsuchi and Temari.
"Good work, Temari. You found her," Shizune complimented the grinning Sand ninja.
"Hmm, but Tenten: who is this?" Anko asked, looking towards Mabui.
"Oh, this is Mabui, now the Raikage's FORMER assistant. Trust me: she was worthy," Tenten replied with a smirk of satisfaction.
"Ok. Did you bring the Raikage like Tsunade wanted?" Shizune asked.
"Yup. Here he is," Mabui said, opening her hand and revealing the insignificant Ay, who was exhausted from uselessly pounding on the flesh walls around him during the journey.
"Heh and I always thought he was tough," Mei smirked, poking at Ay with her fingernail.
"Grrr....damn you, Mizukage...." he wheezed.
"Bad bug!" Mabui roared, closing her hand around him harder than before.
"Heh sorry I doubted you, Tenten," Shizune said to a widely-grinning Tenten.
"Heh. Hard to believe a man who threatened the Sand Village three months ago is so weak," Temari sneered.
"Lady Tsunade will be excited to play with him," Sakura added, a devilish look on her face.
As if on cue, Tsunade appeared on the horizon, followed by Konan, who was clad in a bra and panties made of soft paper. The shrunken Naruto was still perched on Tsunade's mighty shoulder, reclining lazily from the boredom of the ride.
"Ah, good to see all of you back," Tsunade exclaimed to her fellow giants, "This is Konan, former member of the Akatsuki."
"Greetings," Konan replied with a grin, exchanging nods with the others.
"Lady Tsunade, before we begin our meeting, I am proud to inform you that three Leaf kunoichi have proven themselves worthy of joining us," Shizune said, motioning to the amazonian trio, now in Sakuras palm.
"Ah, excellent," Tsunade said, her smile widening, "are you three ready for your ascension?"
"Yes," Kurenai answered with a nod.
"Y-yeah..." Hinata said shyly.
"Hell yeah!" Hanabi shouted, placing her hands on her hips.
"Ah. You chose well, Shizune," Tsunade complimented as Sakura placed them back on the ground. With that, Tsunade formed the hand signs and her new apprentices began to expand.
"H-hinata..." Naruto whispered in disbelief, as the kind, easily-flustered girl became a superior titan before his eyes. When the process was complete, the three new goddesses stretched their arms as they broke in their new powerful forms.
"Yay!" Hanabi thundered, leaping in delight and causing an earthquake for miles around.
"Congratulations, girls. You're now one of us," Ino declared. The others shared their congratulations with them and, once they were done, Shizune beckoned towards the meeting place she created.
144111121111221111111.title: The Goddesses Meet Back in the Land of Fire

1441111211112211111111.content:
As the goddesses gathered within their sealed zone, Tsunade casually tossed Naruto in the middle. Before he could protest, Tsuande formed a hand sign and Naruto, to his utter surprise, returned to his normal size.
"Gee thanks, grandma!" he shouted happily.
"Sigh. Don't get carried away, insect. I just need you at this size for the meeting. Don't worry: I'll shrink you to your rightful size again later," Tsunade assured, an evil grin on her face, "and as a matter of fact, for calling me "grandma" again, ill make you even smaller than you were before."
While Naruto fussed in the center, the giantesses gathered around him and sat down on the soft "cushions" Shizune had made. As she took her place, Sakura adjusted the tiny Sasuke in her cleavage, who had finally begun to awaken from being choked out and nearly suffocated in his fleshy prison.
"Hey Ino," Sakura said, getting her best friend's attention, "I've got a little toy for us to play with when the meeting's over."
"Oh?" Ino replied.
"Yeah. I'll show you after."
"Alright. Let's begin," Tsunade declared, calling for the meeting to begin. She then extended her lets and propped down her feet before the minuscule Naruto, who squeaked a scream as the massive, towering skyscrapers almost crushed him.
"Lick..." Tsunade commanded, wiggling her toes far over his head.
"What the hell? Why?!" Naruto roared in fury.
"Because your big, bad mistress told you to. Now do it," Tsunade replied with a sneer, flexing her toes.
"And you better do a good job, little one," Konan added, moving her feet up to him.
"If you don't wanna get squashed," Shizune said, sliding her feet in too.
"Like the weak little bug you are. Hehe," Tenten smirked, sliding hers in.
"You'll work, little man," Kuranai added, following suit.
"Just call it woman's intuition," Mei chuckled, doing the same.
"Or godly intuition," Mabui corrected, sliding her soles in too.
"Mmm. How I've longed to hear that," Kurotsuchi marveled as she slid her feet in.
"Now work the stress away," Anko ordered.
"And marvel at our power," Ino added.
"Worship for your life," Temari chimed in with a smile.
"Or feel the wrath of your sexy, almighty goddesses," Sakura finished.
"Teehee. Better hurry, buggy," Hanabi giggled mischievously.
"Y-yeah..." Hinata added quietly.
"NOW GET TO WORK!" they all boomed at once, shocking Naruto into action. He made hundreds of Shadow Clones, which spread out among the fourteen titanic sets of soles surrounding him. They rushed to them and climbed all over, massaging and licking as best they could.
"Good boy," Tsunade commended, as the real Naruto doubled over from the strain of making so many clones, "when you recover, you're joining in. You need to get used to it." The women all laughed, and Naruto blushed in humiliation.
As they discussed their next move, Naruto's clones moved around on the miles-long soles towering over them. Occasionally, one would be crushed or knocked off by the humongous toes wiggling while they were on or between them, while others would just be overpowered and forced to dispel from the smells alone. Naruto himself tried to fake being exhausted still after a few minutes, but was prompted by a dirty look from Tsunade to get to work himself. As he did, he couldn't help but marvel at their majestic forms, even their powerful feet getting his attention. Occasionally, one of the girls would bully him by poking at him with their toes and smirking devilishly as he winced at the proximity.
About halfway through the meeting, Mabui extended her hand over the circle and handed the injured Raikage to Tsunade.
"Ugh...shoulda known that you were behind all this, 'princess,' Ay spat to the titanic Tsunade.
Tsunade made a fake face of sadness, "Aw. Sorry, Ay, but "princess" isn't nearly good enough anymore. I'm GODDESS Tsunade now."
"I don't care what you want, woman! Just know that you will NEVER be as strong as me!" Ay roared, crackling with electricity.
There was a slight pause before the circle of women burst out laughing, Tsunade especially so. She then lifted her mountainous fist over the Raikage and said, "Good little men behave themselves before their masters. Any last words then?"
Ay took a moment to marvel at the mighty fist casting a shadow over him, but then regained his composure and bolted for the end of her palm. However, it was too far to the end, and the fist came crashing down and erased him completely.
"Heh, stupid little man," Temari smirked, purposely tightening her toes around and destroying a Naruto clone.
"I want one too," Tenten exclaimed.
"Speaking of little men, where'd the real Naruto go?" Sakura asked.
"Well, hard to tell where with all these clones," Anko replied slyly.
It was a slaughter of clones as the goddesses stomped them out quickly.
"Wait, then where is he?" Kurotsuchi questioned.
"Oh...there he is," Hinata said, after activating her Byakugan. She pointed to Tsunade's big toe and everyone focused their attention there. The tiny shinobi was curled up between her big and second toe, fast asleep.
"Awwww..." Ino exclaimed.
"He has so much room in there," Shizune said with a chuckle.
"Seems he's found his owner, Tsunade," Konan said.
"Hmm yeah...he did us good, so he deserves a good rest," Tsuande cooed, removing the tiny ninja and placing him between her mountainous boobs.
"Speaking of which, I had the villagers make you something special, Tsunade," Shizune said, reaching behind herself and pulling out a giant black bra and panties.
"Oh wow! They're perfect size!" Mei marveled in envy.
"Don't worry. We'll all have them instead of these leaf garments soon. But thank you, Shizune," Tsunade said with a smile as Shizune smiled back in pride.
"Now that the meeting is over, we should get to work," Anko said, anxious to press on.
"Of course," Tsunade replied, and the goddesses stood up and set out to put their plan into action.
1441111211112211111111.title: The Meeting Begins

14411112111122111111111.content:
"Alright, girls. It's time to put our plan into action: shrink all the males in the world to midgets and grow all women to amazons," Tsunade declared happily.
Suddenly, a small voice came from between Sakura's boobs: "ugh. over my dead body."
"Oh, you're awake," Sakura said, bouncing her boobs slightly around Sasuke.
"Heh trust me, little man: I'm not wasting my time on crushing you," Tsunade replied, turning to confer with Konan and Shizune.
"Awwww...he's so cute..." Ino cooed, poking at Sasuke gently.
"Grr! get away from me!" Sasuke shouted angrily, trying in vain to push Ino's monolithic finger away.
"Heh. Little midget," Tenten smirked down at the puny Uchiha, causing him to blush in embarrassment.
"Heh wonder if you can start training him like Tsunade has with Naruto," Mabui chimed in, "I'm definitely going back to my village to pick up some mants to be slaves later after seeing the good job Naruto did cleaning our feet."
"Hmm sounds like a good idea," Kurotsuchi said, closing her eyes at remembering the speck-sized clones worshiping her like she always wanted.
"What about you, Hinata?" Sakura asked the young Hyuga girl.
"I-I might find Kiba and Shino...not sure yet..." she replied, still hesitant and self-conscious at her new stature.
"I'd say whoever can worship me the best is my new man," Mei chuckled, raising laughter from the group.
"Alright. We've decided," Shizune announced, getting everyone's attention, "Konan says she will capture the Akatsuki members and bring us a certain statue they use to seal the tailed beasts."
The paper angel grinned, "It'd be my pleasure. I want to show Pain what a REAL god can do."
"Alright. The rest of us will announce our plan to the four corners of the ninja world," Tsunade added, "Mei, i trust you can deal with your own village."
"Oh yes," the Mizukage replied with a smile.
"Kurotsuchi, you have the Hidden Stone Village."
"Yup. Are WE activating the jutsu when the time comes?" the stone ninja replied curiously.
"Yep. We'll be doing it together. Temari, you have the Hidden Sand, Mabui you have the Hidden Cloud and Shizune, Anko and Kurenai can deal with the Leaf Village." Tsunade finished.
"Anyone wanna come with me?" Mabui asked.
"Sure," Tenten and Hanabi simultaneously said, causing them to giggle.
"Heh. I want the Hidden Stone for myself. Sorry, girls," Kurotsuchi said with a devilish smirk.
"Alright. You guys wanna come with me? might be fun," Temari asked Ino and Sakura, who each nodded cheerfully in response.
"Alright. I must deal with providing the place for our jutsu. Good luck, my sisters," Tsunade announced. She quickly scrunched her toes together to make sure Naruto was still asleep between them, and she smiled when she felt his puny body between them. Thus, the goddesses went their separate ways once more.
14411112111122111111111.title: Altimatum: Ant VS Boot

choices: Temari, Sakura and Ino: Playing with the Sand Village
144111121111221111111111.content:
Intent on capturing all the tailed-beast chakra the Akatsuki had sealed away in the Gedo Statue, Konan made her way to the Five Seal Barrier Cliff to retrieve it. Each of her steps formed massive cracks behind in the earth itself as she quickened her pace slightly when she entered the Land of Rivers. However, when the cliff was in sight, she caught a glimpse of a tiny, tiny white bird approaching her face.
"HAA!" Deidara shouted, forming his hand sign and causing his clay bird to explode in Konan's eye, momentarily blinding her.
"Ugh! Deidara, you insolent worm!" Konan thundered, her godly voice shaking the entire area for miles around. The attack hadn't hurt that much, but it was a surprising and annoying attack.
"Fear my Ultimate Art!" Deidara yelled, creating more clay birds. However, with a mere exhale, Konan managed to simply blow the birds out of the air and to the ground where they detonated.
"Pathetic," the giantess mocked, lifting her massive foot over the tiny pyromaniac. Before she could bring it down however, she felt a strange force impact against her, causing her to lose her balance and fall on her butt, creating an enormous earthquake, as well as two butt cheek-shaped craters.
"Stand down, Konan," Pain ordered, having used Almighty Push to shove her over. However, the jutsu, despite its power, was only barely able to move something of Konan's size and weight, so he was already breathing heavily.
"In your dreams, little man," Konan replied, glaring at her former leader.
"Sigh, you may have gained this new power...but it's not enough to defeat GOD!" Pain said, motioning for the other members of the Akatsuki to emerge. Before Konan could react, she felt a pinprick in her lower thigh. She focused on that area and saw Hidan, slashing violently at her flesh in a attempt to acquire her blood for his ritual.
"Dammit, where is the blood?! Jashin demands it!" he shouted angrily, as he was only able to penetrate the first layer of skin.
"Sigh. Parasites," Konan grumbled, grabbing the tiny scythe-wielder between two of her fingers and raised him up to her face.
"Tch! HAA!" Deidara cried, launching more detonating-clay birds into Konan's massive frame but to no avail.
"They say you're immortal," Konan said to her captive, "let's find out, shall we?" With that, she stood up and dropped Hidan onto the ground, causing him to land painfully in a heap.
"OW! You bitch!" he screamed.
"Die, little cockroach!" Konan boomed, bringing her foot down on top of him with all the strength she had. This literally broke the landscape, as the entire barrier cliff crumbled to rubble instantly and the resulting seismic tantrums destroyed what was left standing. When the smoke cleared, there was a very deep footprint in the ground, and Hidan was nowhere to be seen.
"Wow, he literally turned to dust," Konan exclaimed with a chuckle. The other members of the Akatsuki gawked in utter shock at the testament to power standing before them.
"Yeah, goodbye," Itachi said, disappearing in a flock of ravens to fight another day.
"Damn you, Itachi!" Deidara yelled.
"Sigh...probably a smart move," Sasori added, popping out of his Hiruko puppet to face the threat himself.
"I''m sure he has his reasons," Kisame assured, looking down in deep thought about why his partner would abandon them.
"Enough chatter. We've got a monster to slay..." Pain said, extending his hands, "Almighty Push!"
Again, the jutsu was not enough to send Konan flying, but this time it did even less. To Konan, it felt like a slight loss in balance.
"Sigh I'll give you all one chance to surrender now: kiss my feet to show me you're obedience," the titanic woman demanded with a smirk, extending her bare foot towards them as a gesture.
"Damn you, woman," Sasori answered, summoning his Third Kazekage Puppet, "Iron Sand: Six Inch Nail!"
The conglomeration of iron-sand shot out into the giant foot before them. However, it was unable to even scratch the perfect skin, and disintegrated on impact.
Konan burst out laughing at this and flicked the puppet master back with her toe. She then knelt down and brought her fist down on top of him and his puppet.
"Oh god!" Kisame exclaimed, making sure to keep his distance. When Konan withdrew her hand, Sasori was nothing more than a flattened collection of puppet parts.
"Damn. Goodbye, Sasori my man," Deidara said, as he pulled out a lump of his detonating clay and began to scarf it down.
"Water Style: Giant Exploding Water Shockwave!" Kisame yelled, creating the huge dome of water around him. However, to Konan, the bubble barely reached her toenails, causing her to giggle some more.
"Summoning Jutsu: 1000 Hungry Sharks!" Kisame added, summoning his band of sharks inside the bubble. He then fused with Sharkskin and moved the sphere so it encompassed two of Konan's toes. Almost immediately, the goliath beauty yelped in pain, as the sharks tore at her flesh within the water. She withdrew her foot, and was surprised when she was pushed over by another Almighty Push from Pain. Already off-balance, she fell onto her back, creating more earthquakes.
"Kakuzu! Deidara! Now!" Pain shouted.
"Very well," Kakuzu grumbled, leaping onto Konan's exposed belly in his Five-Hearts mode. He then got to work launching a volley of elemental attacks on her.
"Alright, time for the C4 Karura!" Deidara announced, vomiting out the giant clay form of himself. Again: this statue barely reached the top of Konan's toes. The explosives expert maneuvered the Karura onto Konan's chest and positioned it near her face.
"Now die and become my latest masterpiece! HAAA!"
The Karura exploded, but to Deidara's shock, nothing happened to the giant woman, who merely smirked and grabbed a hold of him and Kakuzu.
"Bombs are too small to even hurt my cells. Pitiful," she thundered, tightening her insanely powerful grasp around them. After a few seconds, all five of Kakuzu's hearts were shattered and his body was dead, while Deidara, his ribs crushed, choked out and fell unconscious.
"Yeah, I'm gonna torture you a little first, Deidara," Konan chuckled, placing him on the ground. Kisame, unable to hold his Water Style techniques any longer, reverted to his normal state, dispelled his summoning and allowed the water bubble to collapse.
"What now, boss?" he questioned as he stood at Pain's side. All the leader of the Akatsuki could do was sigh.
"Tobi and Zetsu appear to have abandoned us."
"Like they would be much help right now," the sharkish ninja muttered.
"Is that all you have?" Konan asked in a mocking tone, fake-yawning at the same time, "are you ready to kiss my feet yet?"
"Kisame...get away from here...I'm gonna end this now..." Pain ordered, rolling up his sleeves.
"Y-you sure? I mean...as far as I can tell...we're outmatched," Kisame questioned in disbelief, sheathing Sharkskin on his back.
"Yes...now go.."
"Don't need to tell me twice," Kisame assured, racing away as fast as he could, leaving Pain to face the mighty Konan alone. As he left, he noticed that Deidara had disappeared, the place where he had been littered with crow feathers.
'Heh, so he didn't abandon us,' he thought as he fled across the shattered landscape.
"Well, well, well. What do we have here?" Konan taunted, tapping her foot gently on the ground, "a disobedient little man who needs to be taught a lesson. Maybe a spanking? Nah, might kill you at your size."
"...I'm sorry about this, Konan..." Pain said, forming the Planetary Devastation ball in his hand. He then allowed it to fly quickly right into Konan's cheek. Before the paper angel could react, the hundreds of tons of rock began encasing her head inside a giant sphere.
"HRRRRAAAAAAAAH!!!!" Pain roared, raising is arms and clenching his fists as he focused on adding more rock. After a few seconds, it was completed and he lowered his hands as he surveyed the sphere or rock around his former partner's head.
However, the instant the process was completed, Konan's giant hands reached up, her mighty fingers gripping each side of the sphere and ripping it in half off of her.
"GRAAAAH!" her booming, thunderous voice sounded throughout the region as she freed herself. The utterly-shocked Pain, exhausted from using too much chakra, looked up and almost fainted at the sight: Konan was glaring directly down at him, her arms crossed in front of her, and the skin on her face and upper neck was cut in several places. And judging by her expression, she was NOT in a playful mood anymore...
"...that...was...a...mistake..." she growled through gritted teeth. Pain fell down in exhaustion and defeat before her, and almost felt the urge to beg her for mercy as she continued, "...you are gonna pay for this...DEARLY..." With that, the giantess picked up Pain and placed him on her shoulder.
"But for now, I've got a job to do..." she finished, turning to face the damaged Gedo Statue, which had been inside the cliff before she had pulverized it. As she lifted it up easily and prepared to walk back to the Land of Fire, she glanced at her shoulder at the puny Pain, who was barely conscious from the strain on his ckakra. She gave him one last threatening look before turning away and starting on her journey, leaving the shattered Land of Rivers behind her.
144111121111221111111111.title: Konan: Standing Above the Akatsuki

1441111211112211111111111.content:
Across the Ninja World, the trio of Temari, Sakura and Ino made their way through the Land of Wind towards the Hidden Sand Village. Thanks to the arid, hot climate, the girls began to sweat. The perspiration between Sakura's boobs built up, almost drowning the tiny Sasuke several times along the way.
